title: Blazing New Trails: Meet Mexico’s First UCI-certified Sport Director who Helped Isaac del Toro Hit the Bigtime
content:
Ex-pro Alessandra Giuseppina Grassi is Mexico's first UCI-certified sports director and helped open the door to Europe for WorldTour phenom Isaac del Toro: 'We are showing that Mexicans can have big ambitions and achieve them in cycling.'

Read the full article at Blazing New Trails: Meet Mexico’s First UCI-certified Sport Director who Helped Isaac del Toro Hit the Bigtime on Velo.
author: ahood
